Truly the Next Gen Experience. The Graphics one of the best, so much so in the beginning of the game, it showcases the next gen graphics in a tram ride.
It's good to look back on as a land mark in game design and as a foot note in gaming history. But other than that, it's a poorly aged slog with slippery movement gross sound and bad physics.

I've been away from the Half-Life series for quite some time. After the announcement of Half-Life: Alyx, I was inspired to run through the series again and see how it holds up.

Half-Life was released in 1998, and for a game of its time, i'm still impressed. There's a charm in the world-building that very few modern games replicate, if at all. There really is a reason Half-Life is so heavily regarded as a golden gaming experience. While the controls (mostly the jumping and physics) are definitely outdated, they're not impossible to grasp and enjoy even by today's standards.

Half-Life illustrates a much simpler time in gaming, and it's evident in the basic combat loop and generally linear adventuring experience. The story is told through gameplay and interaction rather than forced cut-scenes, something Valve is well known for. Modern games rarely take this approach, and it definitely adds to the charm of Half-Life.

If you're looking to brush up on some classic gaming experiences, Half-Life won't disappoint. The world is still as mysterious and chaotic as ever. There's no shortage of challenge upon your first few runs.

Multiplayer, however, is largely dead and understandably so. You'll find plenty of empty servers with only a select few with a handful of players itching for nostalgia.

A classic. Unexpectedly challenging. Recommended for anyone and everyone, as the classic it is.

It's freakin' Half-Life. Play it, dude.
This game would be a lot easier if Black Mesa followed proper WHMIS procedures.
So excited for the new Half-Life but can't afford VR headset.

This game was responsible for Steam,Counter-Strike,Portal and the several thousands of other mods that the commounity made thoughout the years. It has the perfect mix of gameplay and story all while the excellent map design and visuals progress thoughout the story. Its more than a game, its a experience.
Valve's debut title that changed the perspective of video games... Amazing storyline, amazing gameplay for a late 90s title....
If anyone is a fan of back-in-the-day singleplayers with a good story and nobody but yourself and your weapons, pick this up. This is on par with Star-Trek Voyager Elite Force.

This came out before I was even born, and it still plays pretty well. Of course, it shows it's age, particularly in some of the level designs, but it's definitely worth it for the experience and history.

[h1]This game is actually as awesome as the cult members say.[/h1]

Because
[list]
[*]RPG-like immersion and ambiance
[*]amazing and deliberate level design
[*]minimal but memorable audio
[*]succinct and straightforward gameplay
[*]clean and uncluttered HUD
[*]challenging but fair [b]**[/b]
[*]Gordon Freeman and headcrabs
[*]updates 20 years post release
[/list]

[h1]9.99 / 10[/h1]
[b]**[/b] -0.01 for that super lame final boss tho

Half-Life fait clairement parti des jeux à faire ABSOLUMENT dans votre carrière de gamer. Le scénario vous entraine immédiatement à prendre à coeur votre mission. Mélangez --> action intense, énigme, difficulté, rage, sauvegarde rapide, clonage pour les PNJ.. et cela vous donne : HALF-LIFE ! <3 <3
게임을 하기 위해 구매한 것인가 아니면 더빙을 듣기 위해 구매한 것인가

This game is so beyond my generation, but I have to say... I adore it. I was born in 2001, so I didn't experience late '90s PC gaming. This game belongs to a culture and an era of gaming a world away from me, yet it still managed to grab me right away, much a like a headcrab or those icky-licky ceiling goons. I'm closing in on the halfway point, and I am so pleased I made the choice to get this game. Despite looking like a potato by today's standards, it still plays incredibly well and I love it. Play this game. Love this game.
BEST FPS OF ALL TIME !! STILL !! as of TODAY  AKA  HeadHarvesterX 20 Year veteran

Знаете у каждого из нас есть своя игра детства с чем оно ассоциируется, и для меня такой является первая Халфа. Самое сложное было выжить в взорвавшейся лаборатории когда лазеры стреляет повсюду, а хедкрабы прыгают на тебя - так оно было в детстве. Сейчас же - вспоминаешь с улыбкой как было весело и страшно стрелять зомби и разгадывать загадки. Но всё же оно всегда останется у меня в сердце.

První hříčka společnosti Valve, která odstartovala cestu za úspěchem celé společnosti. Příběh je zasazen do blízké budoucnosti, kdy hrajete za fyzika Gordona Freemana a dostáváte možnost spolupracovat v tajném středisku Black Mesa na teleportačním přístroji. Avšak ... Jedná se o střílečku z první osoby, kdy v průběhu hry řešíte spoustu zajímavých a kvalitně zpracovaných hádanek. Hra Vám nabídne několik druhů zbraní a nespočet druhů nepřátel včetně několika kvalitně zpracovaných bossfightů.

+ Herní doba (13 hodin)
+ Příběh
+ Hodně zbraní
+ Zábavné hádanky
+ Hodně druhů nepřátel
+ Bossfighty
+ Bunnyhop
+ Hra Vás netahá za ručičku a všechno se učíte sami
+ Multiplayer, který funguje dodnes
+ Možnost ukládání kdykoliv
+ Nenáročné na HW
+ Cena

- Bugy a glitche
- Okolní zvuky většinou "přeřvávají" dialogy
- Mohly by být titulky

Hratelnost 9/10
Možnosti hry 7/10
Zabavení 8/10
Celkové zhodnocení 8/10
